title: FS: T206 Merkle & McGann - PSA Graded

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Merkle & McGann - PSA Graded
posts.post_content:
The following cards are available with prices listed and scans below.

Fred Merkle Portrait, Piedmont Back (PSA 2) - $SOLD
Dan McGann, Polar Back (PSA 2.5) - $SOLD

Price includes shipping. Payment by PPFF or Checks Accepted. Please send a PM if you are interested.

PM sent. I will take the McGann.

Thanks,

Rob
